summary: Comprehensive testing of TGP Bioplastics Kanban board application completed. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working well with minor drag-and-drop issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Cards are not showing draggable='true' attribute, drag-and-drop functionality may not be working

design_issues.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby warnings in console for accessibility

passed_tests: Card CRUD operations with priority and due dates
User management table in admin panel
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix drag-and-drop functionality - ensure cards have draggable='true' attribute and @hello-pangea/dnd is properly implemented. Add aria-describedby to DialogContent components for accessibility.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor drag-and-drop issue
